property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bitter vengeance never glowed so bright nor sang so sweet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{W}, Discard a card: Aven Trooper gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all enchantments. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all enchantments, then return all cards in your graveyard destroyed this way to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If any source would deal 1 or more damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals 2 damage to that permanent or player instead. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature As Floating Shield enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Floating Shield. Sacrifice Floating Shield: Target creature gains protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target enchantment. Madness {W} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By definition, madness ends in one of two ways: clarity . . . or death.

property.value: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Nantuko Calmer: Destroy target enchantment. Threshold - Nantuko Calmer gets +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nantuko Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Nantuko Cultivator and draw that many cards.

property.value: {G}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {G}, Sacrifice Narcissism: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Return X target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Nostalgic Dreams.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each creature token on the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature. Flashback {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Centaur gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature."

property.value: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun - and its darkness radiated across Otaria.
